title: Rachel's Story
description: Rachel Hathaway had no idea where her life was headed. A family tragedy brought her even closer to her brother and in need of a shoulder to cry on. Betrayed by her best friend and boyfriend, she looked for a distraction from life. While working at an animal clinic, she meets Brent. He was good for her, she thought anyway. While volunteering at the animal shelter with her brother's best friend Justin, she encounters feelings she didn't know she had. Will Rachel choose the man she knows loves her or the man she hopes would?
author: Nikki D. Walker
